document_data.name: The Hierophant
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hierophant''' was a [[half-elf]] [[druid]] and [[proxy]] of the [[power]] known as [[Silvanus]].
document_data.Personality: The Hierophant's primary passion in life was nature and her deity Silvanus, to a degree that one could call fanatical. There was a gleam in her eyes whenever she spoke of them, which was most of the time.
document_data.Abilities: In addition to having druidic powers, Silvanus granted the Hierophant the ability to transform herself into any animal or tree that she's seen within his [[divine realm]] of [[Summeroak]].
document_data.Activities: The Hierophant spent most of her time wandering the woodlands of the divine realm known as [[Tir na Og]], looking for those who might appreciate the wild beauty of Summeroak.
